DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_ONE.message: 1. You need Google Chrome for this feature
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_ONE.description: The step one for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_TWO.message: 2. In the Chrome search bar we will look for: chrome: // flags
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_TWO.description: The step two for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_THREE.message: 3. Search the search bar in the flags: # enable-experimental-web-platform-features
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_THREE.description: The step two for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FOUR.message: 4. Give the ENABLE flag: Experimental Web Platform features
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FOUR.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FIVE.message: 5. At the bottom right we access the RELAUNCH button
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FIVE.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_SIX.message: After restarting the browser we will be able to use the browser version.
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_SIX.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_CAREFUL.message: CAREFUL! To work you must be on a secure connection

DEVICE_MP_SERIAL_BAUDRATE.message: Set a value for baud rate. Default value: 115200.

DEVICE_MP_CHECKBOX.message: Do you want to restart the board when connecting?
